description:
The following error is thrown when creating an instance with a non-default security group:

(nova.api 2011.1-workspace:tarmac-20110119093922-2u95mvtsbg5mr3dr): ERROR [TMUKX4RRSY7FKW6P50LS laner tesla] Unexpected error raised: 'long' object is unsubscriptable
(nova.api): TRACE: Traceback (most recent call last):
(nova.api): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/api/ec2/__init__.py", line 311, in __call__
(nova.api): TRACE:     result = api_request.invoke(context)
(nova.api): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/api/ec2/apirequest.py", line 125, in invoke
(nova.api): TRACE:     result = method(context, **args)
(nova.api): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/api/ec2/cloud.py", line 783, in run_instances
(nova.api): TRACE:     'AvailabilityZone'))
(nova.api): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/compute/api.py", line 196, in create
(nova.api): TRACE:     self.trigger_security_group_members_refresh(elevated, group_id)
(nova.api): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/compute/api.py", line 254, in trigger_security_group_members_refresh
(nova.api): TRACE:     for instance in security_group['instances']:
(nova.api): TRACE: TypeError: 'long' object is unsubscriptable
(nova.api): TRACE:

The security group's ID is being added to the security_groups set instead of a security group object.
title: Error thrown when creating instance with non-default group

The following error is thrown when creating an instance with a non-default security group:

(nova.api 2011.1-workspace:tarmac-20110119093922-2u95mvtsbg5mr3dr): ERROR [TMUKX4RRSY7FKW6P50LS laner tesla] Unexpected error raised: 'long' object is unsubscriptable

(nova.api): TRACE:     result = method(context, **args)
